title: 820-2915-B working slow
message:
This board apparently works fine, a bit slow.
I've run geekbench 4 and on the CPU scores normal.
On the GPU on the other hand scores very poorly, under 2000.
At the software installation took longer time than normal.
Also i've run ASD on it, and no issues find.
Any suggestions?

title: 820-2915-B working slow
message: Probably the HDD or RAM causing it to run slow. Going to have a dead GPU tomorrow tho, so I wouldn't waste the time.

title: 820-2915-B working slow
message:
If problem appears only with GPU, shouldn't be a BIOS issue.
But you can try new BIOS (clean ME), just in case.

Looks more like GPU issue.
Try first different RAM and HDD.
GPU could be disabled by software, or using Tiresias GPUkiller.

title: 820-2915-B working slow
message:
I've tried everything.
most likely gpu issues.issues
the MacBook it's usable though, just a bit slow on application that requires gpu computing.
thank you.
